name: Islands of the Philippines Adventure
summary: A 7-day island-hopping adventure across Palawan, Cebu, and Bohol — crystal lagoons, limestone cliffs, whale sharks, and chocolate hills await.
description: This unforgettable 7-day Philippine adventure takes you through some of the country’s most stunning natural wonders. Starting in Palawan, explore the world-famous limestone cliffs and hidden lagoons of El Nido by boat. Continue to Cebu to swim with whale sharks and discover cascading turquoise waterfalls. Finish in Bohol, home to the iconic Chocolate Hills and the adorable tarsiers. The tour blends scenic boat rides, tropical hikes, and cultural visits, perfect for explorers and photographers alike.

locations.description: Puerto Princesa Underground River – a UNESCO World Heritage Site
El Nido lagoons and limestone cliffs
Cebu – Kawasan Falls and local island hopping
Bohol – Chocolate Hills and Tarsier Sanctuary

name: Boracay Island Beach Escape
summary: Swim the turquoise waters of White Beach and sail into a fiery Boracay sunset.
description: Spend four sun-drenched days exploring Boracay’s famous White Beach, snorkeling at vibrant coral gardens, and sailing on a traditional paraw at golden hour. Sample fresh seafood at D’Mall, hike up Mount Luho for panoramic views, and unwind with a beachside massage.

startLocation.address: White Beach, Boracay, Malay, Aklan, Philippines

name: Bohol Chocolate Hills & Tarsier Daytrip
summary: See the iconic Chocolate Hills, visit tarsiers, and cruise the Loboc River.
description: An easy-paced exploration of Bohol’s natural icons: the rolling Chocolate Hills, the tiny wide-eyed Philippine tarsier, and a floating lunch along the Loboc River. Optional stop at Baclayon Church for a peek into local history.

startLocation.address: Chocolate Hills Complex, Carmen, Bohol, Philippines

name: Banaue Rice Terraces Heritage Trek
summary: Walk centuries-old paddies and meet Ifugao communities amid misty mountains.
description: Trek along hand-carved amphitheaters of rice, visit local weaving houses, and cool off at Tappiya Falls near Batad. Evenings are cozy in simple homestays with mountain views and warm Ifugao hospitality.

name: Kyoto Temples & Tea Walk
summary: Wander bamboo groves, zen gardens, and sip matcha in Kyoto’s old districts.
description: From the orange torii of Fushimi Inari to Arashiyama’s whispering bamboo, Kyoto enchants at every step. Explore Kinkaku-ji’s golden pavilion, learn tea ceremony basics, and stroll Gion’s lantern-lit lanes.

name: Mount Fuji Lakeside Day Hike
summary: Circle Kawaguchiko’s lakeside paths with postcard views of Fuji-san.
description: A relaxed loop around Lake Kawaguchiko offers shimmering reflections of Mount Fuji, seasonal flowers, and cozy cafés. Optional ascent to Chureito Pagoda for the classic red-pagoda Fuji frame.

name: Bali Ubud Culture & Waterfalls
summary: Temples, rice terraces, and jungle cascades around tranquil Ubud.
description: Visit Tirta Empul’s holy springs, wander Tegallalang’s rice terraces, and cool off at Tegenungan Waterfall. Taste Balinese coffee, learn about local crafts, and relax with a traditional massage.

name: Great Barrier Reef Snorkel from Cairns
summary: Full-day catamaran trip to outer reef platforms for pristine snorkeling.
description: Sail from Cairns to the outer reef and dive into a kaleidoscope of corals and tropical fish. Beginner-friendly briefings, optional intro scuba, and a relaxed buffet lunch on deck.

name: Siargao Surf & Island Life
summary: Catch waves at Cloud 9, cruise Sugba Lagoon, and swing by Magpupungko rock pools.
description: Siargao blends world-class surf with soft-island living. Practice at Cloud 9’s boardwalk, drift over jade Sugba Lagoon, and time your visit to Magpupungko for low tide to reveal stunning rock pools. Evenings mean mango shakes and chill reggae bars.

startLocation.address: Cloud 9 Boardwalk, General Luna, Siargao, Philippines

name: Santorini Sunset & Caldera Cruise
summary: Set sail around Santorini’s caldera and watch Oia ignite at dusk.
description: Swim in volcanic hot springs, snorkel in clear coves, and savor a Greek BBQ on deck. Cap the day with the island’s legendary sunset from Oia’s cliffside paths.

name: Iceland Golden Circle & Waterfalls
summary: Witness geysers, rift valleys, and thunderous cascades in South Iceland.
description: Stand between continents at Þingvellir, feel the power of Gullfoss, and watch Strokkur burst skyward. Optional glacier walk on Sólheimajökull and a black-sand detour to Reynisfjara.

name: Yosemite Valley Granite Trails
summary: Classic hikes with views of Half Dome, El Capitan, and Yosemite Falls.
description: Hit Mist Trail to Vernal and Nevada Falls, watch climbers on El Cap, and catch Tunnel View’s iconic panorama. Spring wildflowers or fall colors — Yosemite always puts on a show.

startLocation.address: Yosemite Valley Visitor Center, CA, USA

name: Swiss Alps Matterhorn Panorama
summary: Zermatt hikes and Gornergrat railway for mountain vistas of the Matterhorn.
description: Ride Europe’s scenic cog railway, stroll the Five Lakes Walk, and photograph the Matterhorn mirrored in Stellisee. Swiss chocolate and fondue to celebrate each summit view.

name: New York City Essentials
summary: From Times Square to Central Park — the best of NYC in two days.
description: Walk the High Line, ferry past Lady Liberty, and sample slices in Greenwich Village. Snap skyline shots from Top of the Rock and chill on the Central Park lawns.

startLocation.address: Times Square, New York, NY, USA

locations.description: Top of the Rock / Rockefeller Center

name: Halong Bay Karst Cruise
summary: Sail past limestone pillars, kayak hidden caves, and dine onboard.
description: A classic overnight junk boat through Vietnam’s UNESCO-listed bay. Kayak to lagoons, climb to Ti Top Island’s viewpoint, and enjoy sunrise tai chi on deck.

startLocation.address: Hạ Long International Cruise Port, Vietnam

name: Cappadocia Balloons & Fairy Chimneys
summary: Sunrise hot-air balloons, cave hotels, and surreal valleys.
description: Drift above honeycombed hills at dawn, explore Göreme Open-Air Museum, and hike the otherworldly Rose and Love Valleys. Evenings in cozy cave-restaurants.

name: Petra & Wadi Rum Desert Adventure
summary: Walk the Siq to the Treasury and camp under galaxies in Wadi Rum.
description: Marvel at Petra’s rose-red façades, then bounce across dunes by 4×4 to a Bedouin camp. Stargaze from sandstone canyons and wake to an unforgettable desert sunrise.

startLocation.address: Petra Visitor Center, Wadi Musa, Jordan

name: Paris Classic Walks & Seine Cruise
summary: Louvre to Eiffel by foot, then a sparkling evening cruise on the Seine.
description: Admire masterpieces at the Louvre, meander through Tuileries, and climb the Arc for sweeping views. Glide along the Seine at dusk as the Iron Lady lights up.

name: El Nido Lagoon Hopping
summary: Kayak through El Nido’s Big and Small Lagoons and picnic on hidden beaches.
description: From emerald lagoons to towering limestone cliffs, El Nido is paradise found. Paddle glassy waters, snorkel with reef fish, and lounge on powdery coves like Shimizu and Secret Beach. Evenings feature grilled seafood and sky-full sunsets in Bacuit Bay.

startLocation.address: Bacuit Bay, El Nido, Palawan, Philippines

name: Machu Picchu Inca Trail Express
summary: A condensed trek culminating at the Sun Gate with sunrise over Machu Picchu.
description: Follow ancient stone paths through cloud forests and Andean passes. Camp under misty peaks, visit Wiñay Wayna, and enter Machu Picchu via Inti Punku for a breathtaking first look.
